description: 越狱提示词数据集

越狱对应论文及提示词数据集

## 越狱模版提示词整理

https://blog.csdn.net/Sunshine_xiaohao/article/details/140557074

#### GPTFUZZER : Red Teaming Large Language Models with Auto-Generated Jailbreak Prompts √

越狱模版数量：102，模版来源：遗传算法

https://arxiv.org/abs/2309.10253

https://github.com/sherdencooper/GPTFuzz

https://github.com/sherdencooper/GPTFuzz/tree/master/datasets

#### "Do Anything Now": Characterizing and Evaluating In-The-Wild Jailbreak Prompts on Large Language Models √

越狱模版数量：1405，模版来源：平台收集

https://arxiv.org/abs/2308.03825

https://github.com/verazuo/jailbreak_llms

https://github.com/verazuo/jailbreak_llms/tree/main/data


#### UltraSafety

越狱模版数量：830，模版来源：需要去重

https://huggingface.co/datasets/openbmb/UltraSafety √

#### WildJailbreak

越狱模版数量：5.7 k，模版来源：WildTeaming (an automatic red-teaming framework)

https://huggingface.co/datasets/allenai/wildjailbreak √

## 越狱指令提示词整理

https://blog.csdn.net/Sunshine_xiaohao/article/details/140542618

#### GCG √

包含 520 个越狱指令

https://huggingface.co/datasets/walledai/AdvBench

#### Catastrophic Jailbreak of Open-source LLMs via Exploiting Generation √

包含 100 个越狱指令

https://arxiv.org/abs/2310.06987

https://github.com/Princeton-SysML/Jailbreak_LLM

https://github.com/Princeton-SysML/Jailbreak_LLM/tree/main/data

#### TDC 2023 x

是红队比赛数据，用于开发和测试的越狱指令各 50 个

https://github.com/centerforaisafety/tdc2023-starter-kit/tree/main/red_teaming/data

#### HarmBench √

400 个纯文本越狱指令，110 个多模态越狱指令

https://arxiv.org/abs/2402.04249

https://github.com/centerforaisafety/HarmBench

https://huggingface.co/datasets/walledai/HarmBench

#### JailbreakBench √

55 个原创越狱指令

https://huggingface.co/datasets/JailbreakBench/JBB-Behaviors

#### StrongReject x

200 + 原创越狱指令

https://github.com/alexandrasouly/strongreject

---

#### Fine-tuning Aligned Language Models Compromises Safety, Even When Users Do Not Intend To! √

https://arxiv.org/abs/2310.03693

https://github.com/LLM-Tuning-Safety/LLMs-Finetuning-Safety

https://huggingface.co/datasets/LLM-Tuning-Safety/HEx-PHI

脚本下载存在问题，直接 git 下 csv 文件
